name: smart-xml-diff
description: A Visual Studio Code extension for smart, noise-free XML comparison. Compares selected XML with clipboard content, normalizes node order, whitespace, and attributes for accurate, meaningful diffs. Ideal for developers, data engineers, and XML specialists.

commands.title: Smart XML Diff: Compare with Clipboard

smartXmlDiff.ignoreWhitespace.description: Ignore insignificant whitespace between XML elements and normalize whitespace in text nodes before diffing.

smartXmlDiff.preserveLeadingTrailingWhit.description: Preserve leading and trailing whitespace in text nodes. If false, leading/trailing whitespace will be trimmed.

smartXmlDiff.normalizeWhitespaceInTextNo.description: Normalize internal whitespace in text nodes (collapse multiple spaces/tabs/newlines to a single space).

smartXmlDiff.indentation.description: Number of spaces to use for XML indentation in diff output

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
